text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Without declaring it @POTUS & his failing administration have gone for herd immunity but they are too stupid to realise that just like Sweden, #COVID19 herd immunity caused more deaths and it prolonged economy pain. @realDonaldTrump is a moron & murderer
